metamagic.name: Absorbing Spell
metamagic.desc: Damage-dealing Spell/Cantrip grants Resistance to Elemental damage for 3 turns.

metamagic.name: Bloodied Spell
metamagic.desc: Damaging Spell/Cantrip inflicts Bleeding for 3 turns.

metamagic.name: Careful Spell
metamagic.desc: Allies automatically succeed Saving Throws against your Spell/Cantrip; AoE spells don't affect your allies.

metamagic.name: Defensive Spell
metamagic.desc: Damage-dealing Spell/Cantrip grants Resistance to Physical damage for 3 turns.

metamagic.name: Distance Spell
metamagic.desc: Increase range of targeted Spell/Cantrip by 50%, or increase melee Spell/Cantrip range to 9m/30ft.

metamagic.name: Dreadful Spell
metamagic.desc: Damage-dealing Spell/Cantrip inflicts Terrified for 1 turn.

metamagic.name: Empowered Spell
metamagic.desc: Damage-dealing Spell/Cantrip rolls damage with Advantage.

metamagic.name: Extended Spell
metamagic.desc: Double duration of conditions, summons, and surfaces created by Spell/Cantrip.

metamagic.name: Favored Spell
metamagic.desc: Damage-dealing Spell/Cantrip gains a +10 bonus to the Attack Roll.

metamagic.name: Heightened Spell
metamagic.desc: Targets of Spell/Cantrip roll Saving Throws with Disadvantage.

metamagic.name: Maximized Spell
metamagic.desc: Cantrip deals maximum amount of damage possible.

metamagic.name: Piercing Spell
metamagic.desc: Damage-dealing Spell/Cantrip ignores all Resistances.

metamagic.name: Quickened Spell
metamagic.desc: Spell/Cantrip that costs an Action now costs a Bonus Action.

metamagic.name: Regenerative Spell
metamagic.desc: Damage-dealing Spell/Cantrip heals you for half damage inflicted.

metamagic.name: Restorative Spell
metamagic.desc: Single target Spell/Cantrip also provides Latent Restoration.

metamagic.name: Seeking Spell
metamagic.desc: Spell/Cantrip rolls Attack Roll with Advantage.

metamagic.name: Subtle Spell
metamagic.desc: Spell/Cantrip may be cast while Silenced.

metamagic.name: Tempestuous Spell
metamagic.desc: Spell/Cantrip pushes targets back 9m/30ft and inflicts Prone on failed Strength Save.

metamagic.name: Tripled Spell
metamagic.desc: Single target Spell/Cantrip now targets 3 creatures.

metamagic.name: Twinned Spell
metamagic.desc: Single target Spell/Cantrip now targets 2 creatures.
